author: newsr.in
title: Salman Khan's girls, Zareen Khan and Daisy Shah heat it up
text:
They were both launched by * Salman Khan *, but their careers did not take off in earnest. *Zareen Khan* was seen with the star in Veer (2010) while *Daisy Shah* teamed up with him in Jai Ho (2014).*Daisy Shah (left) and Zareen Khan*
Now, it seems the two girls are hellbent on getting noticed with their sizzling act in in the ... Â»
